home.end_journey_message: Are you sure you want to end your current journey?
home.location_permission_denied: You have denied location permission. To ensure the use of positioning functions, please turn it on in settings.
home.android_foreground_notification_text: MemoLanes will continue to record in the background

journey.no_data: There's no data yet, go ahead and explore the world!

db_optimization.notification: Your database requires optimization, please go to Settings tab and click [Optimize database] button.
db_optimization.already_optimized: Database is already optimized. Nothing to do.
db_optimization.confirm: Your database requires optimization. It is recommended to backup your data before proceeding.

import_fow_data.description_md:
Import data generated by the Fog of World app.  
This is an experimental feature and currently only supports importing the Sync folder (compressed in Zip format) from Fog of World's cloud sync.  
For more granular control, such as importing multiple segments of data, you can try using the "Export MemoLanes Archive" feature provided by [Fog Machine - Time Machine](https://fogmachine.8bits.io/time-machine).
import_fow_data.warning_for_import_multiple_data_md:
Note: The database already contains Fog of World data.  
Importing multiple Fog of World data may not be ideal (e.g., simple merging may cause duplicate data).  

For more precise control (such as processing snapshots individually and computing differences), we recommend using [Fog Machine - Time Machine](https://fogmachine.8bits.io/time-machine).

unexpected_exit_notification.notification_permission_reason: In order to remind you when the program exits, we will request notification permission.
unexpected_exit_notification.notification_permission_denied: You have denied permission. You can modify it later in settings.
unexpected_exit_notification.change_affect_next_time: Your changes will take effect in the next recording.
unexpected_exit_notification.notification_message: Recording was unexpectedly stopped, please restart the app.
